titleInfo.title: EXACT SOLUTION OF THE SCHRODINGER-EQUATION OF 2 ELECTRONS INTERACTING WITH AN INTENSE ELECTROMAGNETIC-FIELD

name.namePart: AG Theoretische Atom-, Molekül- und Laserphysik

mods.abstract: The exact solution of the Schrodinger problem of two electrons interacting with a laser field is presented. This solution differs significantly from the product of two independent one-electron Volkov solutions, due to the presence of the Coulomb correlation. In the special but important case of a monochromatic field, the corresponding stationary Floquet solution and the associated Floquet propagator are also obtained explicitly.
